name: Eco-Friendly Magnetic Knife Block
description:
Eco-friendly magnetic knife block, takes up little bench space and is hygienic. Ideal for renters, wedding and birthday gifts!

The Facts:
:: Hand made so each is individual in its own way
:: eco-friendly MDF
:: low VOC paint, available in 5 colours (red, green, orange, blue and white)
:: holds 6 knives of various sizes securely 
:: rare-earth magnets
:: knives not included

Important Info:
:: you will require a Phillips head screwdriver - so this can be flat packed to save packaging and postage, the base and top are sent unattached with 2 screws to secure in place.

:: blocks are hand made to order - please allow up to 7 days from order to postage. Please contact us if you have any queries.

Dimensions:
:: LENGTH approx. 260mm (10.2 inches)
:: WIDTH approx. 246mm (9.7 inches)
:: DEPTH approx. 121mm (4.8 inches)

The small print:
:: take care when moving block with knives attached 
:: It should also go without saying, keep away from edges and little ones. 

Please note: prices in this store are in Australian Dollars.

To view all colours, please visit: www.feelfeltfound.com.au. Please note that computer monitors may display colours differently.

name: Turquoise Beach House Art Frame
description:
Certified Organic linen screen printed with natural dye in turquoise housed in a modern white frame to accentuate the design. This pattern is a fretwork taken from an old Queenslander house in Brisbane, Australia and is from Thea & Sami's fabulous collection. This is a great piece for a modern, beach house feel. 

Exterior frame size is 13cm x 18cm (5" x 7")
Interior size is 9cm x 14cm (3.5" x 5.5")
Frame is 3.75cm wide (1.5")and has a glass front

We can do a series of this design in this size or others. Please contact us with what you require and we can do a special listing.

Can be wall hung or will stand on it's own. Looks great vertical or horizontal so will fit a variety of spaces.

Please note screen monitors may display colours differently.

name: Red Organic Fabric Drink Coasters
description:
4 hand sewn organic fabric coasters made from Thea and Sami's fabulous hand screen printed certified organic linen in a beautiful Christmas red. Thea and Sami (www.thea-sami.com.au) use eco-friendly inks and personally I love this fretwork print.

I have a limited amount of this fabric but can do larger numbers if wanted. Please contact me for a special listing. I also have turquoise in this pattern (please refer to Art Frame for sample of fabric). 

These are padded with a beautifully soft, eco-friendly bamboo.

Those in the photo are sold so yours will be similar but pattern placement may be slightly different.  Let me know if you want them gift wrapped at no extra charge.

Pricing is in Australian Dollars. Some monitors may display colours differently.
